alert.note: Alert for Northeast Foothills, Sacramento Valley; Northern Sacramento Valley; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 28 at 2:12PM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Tehama and south central Shasta Counties through 300 PM PST... At 212 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northeast of Dairyville, or 14 miles northeast of Red Bluff, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Shingletown, Inwood, Paynes Creek and Manton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Foothills, Sacramento Valley; Northern Sacramento Valley; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park
